page.title: 14HOME LIFE: Day begins
page.content: Here are some{extracts}from {children}about how the day starts for them: 1) Clink! Clink! The{milk's}here! I turn over sleepily. I know I can't go back to sleep. I look at the curtains. I can see it's sunny. Oh well, might as well get up. 2) It was eight o' clock this morning when I got up. I opened my curtains and the sun poured through the window. I went into the{bathroom}and turned on the taps and half-filled the bath with warm water, putting in a generous helping of bath-salts. 3) 7.30 - got up, got washed, took my football stickers downstairs, sorted them out and had breakfast. 4) On most days I get up at 7.10. My {clock-radio}wakes me up so I'm never late for{school.}
